comments.file: This is the project's manifest file - it defines its metadata, dependencies, and tasks.
comments.name: Name of project
comments.type: Specifies how Node.js treats .js files - 'module' for modern ES modules, default is CommonJS
comments.devDependencies: Tools needed only during development, not in production
comments.eslint: Lints JavaScript - catches bugs and enforces coding standards
comments.stylelint: Lints CSS/SCSS - spots errors and keeps your styles consistent
comments.stylelint-config-standard: Popular preset rules for Stylelint - saves time setting up
comments.scripts: Custom commands to run tasks via npm
comments.lint:js: Runs ESLint on all JavaScript files in the project to check for code quality and consistency
comments.lint:css: Runs Stylelint on all CSS files in the project to ensure styles follow defined rules
